original_text: Now concerning the matters about which you wrote: “It is good for a man not to have sexual relations with a woman.”
korean_text: 너희가 쓴 문제에 대하여 말하면 남자가 여자를 가까이 아니함이 좋으나

sentences.original_text: Now concerning the matters about which you wrote:
“It is good for a man not to have sexual relations with a woman.”
sentences.korean_translation: ‘남자가 여자와 성관계를 갖지 않는 것이 좋다’
